name: Dudo
description:
Play this game as dudo, a dark fantasy character spawned in a dark unknown world.

Cool Lighting Effects 👌

A hell lot of lighting effects makes this game more fun to play....

Exciting Levels 😎

This indie game consists of 15+ exciting levels, packed in thrill and fun. Levels are made with very enjoyable perspective. And with every level you go, the darking exciteness increase procedurally. ...

Note: This is the first beta(user testing) version of the game. So it may contains bugs.
